roleset.name: coordinate, manage
roleset.note: ORCHESTRATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'orchestrate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'manage'. (from orchestrate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passivized
example.text: But then came Oct. 13 and [the negative publicity]-1 orchestrated *trace*-1 by the Old Guard, particularly against index arbitrage.
